author: Author
clearHistoryConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear your history?
routingApiError: Unable to calculate route. Please try again later.
routingRateLimitError: Routing service limit reached. Please try again later.
privacyText:
This application stores your preferences locally on your device only. No data is sent to external servers or shared with third parties.

What we store:
- Your favorite locations and notes
- Map position and zoom level
- Home location (if set)
- Map style preference
- Interface language preference

Where it's stored:
All data is stored in your browser's local storage and remains on your device. You can clear this data at any time using your browser settings or the app's clear functions.

No tracking:
We do not use cookies for tracking, analytics, or advertising. The data stored is solely to remember your preferences and improve your experience when using the application.
acknowledgementsLogainm: Logainm.ie API for place name information
acknowledgementsComer: Pronunciations courtesy of Dr Niall Comer, Ulster University, Magee Campus
copyrightText: GPL v3 - Please improve and share improvements with others
motivationText: This was a weekend fun project to provide a mapping app for Gaeilgeoir√≠.
contributionsOSM: Visit openstreetmap.org, edit the map and add an Irish name to any object. There are YouTube videos showing the process.
contributionsAudio: One of my objectives was to have spoken Irish translations of as many streets as possible to help me learn, so providing recordings of street names would be great.
contributionsDisclaimer: There was a lot of AI involved in creating this app, I apologise.
homeLocationNotSet: No home location set. Right-click on the map to set your home location.
noImagesFoundZoom: No images found in this area, try zooming closer first
favoritesDescription: Use favorites to save and describe important locations on the map. Add notes to remember details about each place. You can export your favorites to a .mappa file and share it with others - they can import it using the Import Favorites button.
noFavorites: No favorites yet. Add your first favorite!
favoriteNameRequired: Please enter a name for the favorite
favoriteDeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this favorite?
clearAllFavoritesConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete all favorites? This cannot be undone.
